DOC.brief_title: Endostar Continued Pumping Into Vein Combining With Gemcitabine-Carboplatin Treat Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer ( NSCLC )

This study design evaluate safety efficacy Endostar Continued vein-pumping Combining Gemcitabine-Carboplatin ( GC ) chemotherapy patient NSCLC , seek effective injection .
